## Description {#details}

Represents a range in source code.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smrange">SMRange</a> is implemented using a half-open range, as is the convention in C++. In the string &quot;abc&quot;, the range &#91;1,3) represents the substring &quot;bc&quot;, and the range &#91;2,2) represents an empty range between the characters &quot;b&quot; and &quot;c&quot;.

Definition at line 48 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/smloc-h">SMLoc.h</a>.
